text: uṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉiṉ maṉṉippiṟkum cuvarkkattiṟkum nīṅkaḷ muntuṅkaḷ, accuvarkkattiṉ parappu, vāṉattiṉuṭaiyavum, pūmiyiṉuṭaiyavum parappaip pōṉṟatākum, evarkaḷ allāhviṉ mītum, avaṉ tūtar mītum īmāṉ koḷkiṟārkaḷō, avarkaḷukku atu cittam ceytu vaikkappaṭṭirukkiṟatu. Atu allāhvuṭaiya kirupaiyākum - ataṉai avaṉ nāṭiyavarukku aḷikkiṉṟāṉ. Iṉṉum, allāh makattāṉa kirupaiyuṭaiyavaṉ
